## Welcome!
<br>
The Study Difference Lab is located in the [School of Psychology](https://www.gla.ac.uk/schools/psychology/) at the University of Glasgow. We use innovalte and fun ways to study person perception and we are especially interested in developing adaptable methods to study how children perceive their peers.
